vote.text: Amendment SA 4732 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4732 proposed by Senator Durbin for Senator Leahy. (consideration: CR S8509-8510; text: CR S8509-8510) To improve the bill.
